mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT T.CHILD_INDEX AS STN_INDEX, T.NAME AS STN_NAME, T.Bureau_Shortname AS BUREAU, T.TRACK_NAME AS TRACK_NAME, '-' AS ARR_TIME, TO_CHAR(T.TIME, 'hh24:mi:SS') AS DPT_TIME, 0 as run_days FROM JHPT_RJH.M_TRAINLINETEMP_SCHEDULE_SITEM T WHERE T.PARENT_ID = #{trainId} UNION SELECT T.CHILD_INDEX AS STN_INDEX, T.NAME AS STN_NAME, T.Bureau_Shortname AS BUREAU, T.TRACK_NAME AS TRACK_NAME, TO_CHAR(T.SOURCE_TIME, 'hh24:mi:SS') AS ARR_TIME, TO_CHAR(T.TARGET_TIME, 'hh24:mi:SS') AS DPT_TIME, t.relative_source_time_day run_days FROM JHPT_RJH.M_TRAINLINETEMP_SCHEDULE_RITEM T WHERE T.PARENT_ID = #{trainId} UNION SELECT T.CHILD_INDEX AS STN_INDEX, T.NAME AS STN_NAME, T.Bureau_Shortname AS BUREAU, T.TRACK_NAME AS TRACK_NAME, TO_CHAR(T.TIME, 'hh24:mi:SS') AS ARR_TIME, '-' AS DPT_TIME, t.relative_time_day run_days FROM JHPT_RJH.M_TRAINLINETEMP_SCHEDULE_TITEM T WHERE T.PARENT_ID = #{trainId} ORDER BY STN_INDEX)
